title: Implement reactToMessage method in InstagramApiService
description: Create method to react or unreact to messages using sender_action parameter. Support 'react' with reaction type 'love' and 'unreact' without reaction.
dod: Accepts messageId, action ('react' or 'unreact'), and optional reactionType
Request body with sender_action and payload.message_id
Rate limiting and error handling implemented

notes: React request: { recipient: { id }, sender_action: 'react', payload: { message_id, reaction: 'love' } }
Unreact request: { recipient: { id }, sender_action: 'unreact', payload: { message_id } }
